WRITING.TITLE: Parents of reddit, is it OK to lie to you children to make them do things they are supposed to?
WRITING.TEXT: Inspired by another post. Do you think it's good to make white lies like, if you don't brush your teeth they'll fall out and choke you in your sleep. Or if you don't eat your vegetables they grow big enough to come eat you.

WRITING.TITLE: Most sub-species live in ignorance of their captivity by humans. Humans could very well be the same.

[WP] In 2015 a baby boy is conceived and born within three months. It reaches adulthood in six years. Everything is normal about the man, except for an increased libido. Although intelligent, he can not learn at an accelerated rate. His many children share his trait, and so do theirs. It's now 2100.

WRITING.TEXT: Animals who understand they they are looking at themselves in a mirror are extremely intelligent
